LanguageData.Apparello_Suspender.label: прочные штаны
LanguageData.Apparello_Suspender.description: Ain't a chap on earf lookin' as honest as one wearin' these. With these equipped one should feel more comfortable wading through mud and filth and therefore more inclined to get the job done without distractions
LanguageData.Apparello_Armorpants.label: обитые штаны
LanguageData.Apparello_Armorpants.description: Pair of pants with extra padding in key locations.
LanguageData.Apparello_Spacemarinepants.label: легинсы космодесанта
LanguageData.Apparello_Spacerpants.label: причудливые-легинсы
LanguageData.Apparello_Spacerpants.description: High quality and adapts well to temperature changes. Ideal for space exploration
LanguageData.Apparello_Holdem.label: модные брюки
LanguageData.Apparello_Scrapants.label: брюки с заплатками
LanguageData.Apparello_Scrapants.description: very crude and ugly pair of pants.
LanguageData.Apparello_Pollypocket.label: штаны грузчика
LanguageData.Apparello_Pollypocket.description: Trousers with huge pocket space. They help weakened beings to carry more. Ideal for construction purposes.
LanguageData.Apparello_Jeans.label: джинсы
LanguageData.Apparello_Jeans.description: Sturdy farmer pants. Designed for mucking about on the field.
